thread.title: Cowell won't run for N. Carolina state treasurer next year
thread.title_full: Cowell won't run for N. Carolina state treasurer next year

title: Cowell won't run for N. Carolina state treasurer next year
text:
Cowell won't run for N. Carolina state treasurer next year North Carolina State Treasurer Janet Cowell has changed her mind and won't run for re-election next year. Post to Facebook Cowell won't run for N. Carolina state treasurer next year North Carolina State Treasurer Janet Cowell has changed her mind and won't run for re-election next year.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/politics/2015/10/13/cowell-wont-run-for-n-carolina-state-treasurer-next-year/73864318/   Cowell won't run for N. Carolina state treasurer next year Associated Press, AP 11:08 a.m. EDT October 13, 2015 Janet Cowell, treasurer of North Carolina, speaks at the Bloomberg via Getty Images State & Municipal Finance Conference in New York, U.S., on Wednesday, Nov. 2, 2011. During this year's budget season, states face more challenges than ever as they set financial priorities against the backdrop of lower property tax revenue, lower sales tax revenue and high unemployment. Photographer: Peter Foley/Bloomberg via Getty Images (Photo: Bloomberg, Bloomberg via Getty Images) CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
RALEIGH, N.C. (AP) - North Carolina State Treasurer Janet Cowell has changed her mind and won't run for re-election next year. 
Cowell made the announcement Tuesday to supporters by email. She says she made the decision after careful deliberation and prayer. 
The Democrat also says she won't seek any elected office in 2016. She had been considered a potential U.S. Senate candidate but said during the summer she planned on seeking a third term as treasurer. 
The decision creates an open seat on the Council of State in the November 2016 election. 
Cowell is a former Raleigh city council member and state senator who was elected treasurer in 2008.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/politics/2015/10/13/cowell-wont-run-for-n-carolina-state-treasurer-next-year/73864318/ TOP VIDEOS
